tasks.label: xcodebuild-lifehack-debug
tasks.command: xcodebuild -project LifehackApp.xcodeproj -scheme Lifehack -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15,OS=latest' build

tasks.label: xcodebuild-lifehack-iphone-debug
tasks.command: xcodebuild -project LifehackApp.xcodeproj -scheme "Lifehack iPhone" -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15,OS=latest' build

tasks.label: build-lifehack-iphone-sim
tasks.command: xcodebuild -project LifehackApp.xcodeproj -scheme "Lifehack iPhone" -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15,OS=latest' build
